title: Project-Based Language Education to Strengthen Practical Entrepreneurship Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Basic entrepreneurship terminology and business model comprehension
context.additional_context: Language-centric entrepreneurship education for in-service professionals, emphasizing smartphone-based collaboration tools and field applicability

learning_goals: They can utilize core business terminology with 90% accuracy when writing a business plan.
They can produce marketing content reflecting language style optimization based on target customer analysis.
Learners can validate the linguistic feasibility of entrepreneurial ideas with at least three industry practitioners through team-based PBL (Project-Based Learning) outcomes.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
